titles.title: A resolution referring the bill (H.R. 2098) for the relief of Frederick Paul of Seattle, Washington, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.
Reported to House by House Committee on The Judiciary. Report No: 100-876.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Passed Over by House Without Prejudice.
Called up by House on Call of Private Calendar.
Recommitted by House to House Committee on The Judiciary by Virtue of Objection Made on Call of Private Calendar.

bill.summary: 6/17/1987--Introduced. Refers H.R. 2098, a bill for the relief of a named individual, to the chief judge of the United States Claims Court.
